mapper.select: SELECT c.id, u.nickname, avatar, comment_content, c.create_time FROM t_comment c INNER JOIN t_user u ON c.from_uid = u.id WHERE c.is_check = 1 ORDER BY c.create_time DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT c.from_uid, u.nickname AS from_nickname, u.avatar, c.to_uid, r.nickname as to_nickname, c.id, c.parent_id, c.comment_content, c.create_time FROM t_comment c JOIN t_user u ON c.from_uid = u.id JOIN t_user r ON c.to_uid = r.id WHERE c.is_check = 1 AND parent_id = #{commentId} ORDER BY c.id ASC LIMIT #{limit}, #{size}
